thread.title: Timberland Re-Teams With Horween Leather for Limited 6-Inch Boot and 3-Eye Lug
thread.title_full: Timberland Re-Teams With Horween Leather for Limited 6-Inch Boot and 3-Eye Lug

author: Marcus Cho
title: Timberland Re-Teams With Horween Leather for Limited 6-Inch Boot and 3-Eye Lug
text:
Visit the original post to see all 12 images from this gallery. 
The Horween leather company is one of the oldest in the United States, and with their decades of experiences, they’ve grown into one of the world’s foremost producers of premium leathers. Sneakerheads and fashion enthusiasts will have likely heard the name from the use of these leathers in their favorite products, ranging from New Balance sneakers to watch bands , and now the latest to join the Horween-imbued lineup are two new pairs from Timberland’s repertoire – the 6-Inch Boot and 3-Eye Lug.
While the original silhouettes of both models remain largely unchanged, the 6-Inch will be replacing its nubuck upper entirely with Horween leather, while 3-Eye Lug will also be following suit. Additionally, the collar of the 6-Inch will offer a breathable perforated option.
The Horween x Timberland 6-Inch boot will retail for $350 USD while 3-Eye Lug will retail for $200 USD. Expect both to drop soon at Timberland specialty retail stores as well as Timberland’s official site on February 24.
